org.mini2Dx.core.engine.interpolator.primitive

Class LinearFloatInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.interpolator.primitive.LinearFloatInterpolator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FloatInterpolator

    public final class LinearFloatInterpolator
extends java.lang.Object
implements FloatInterpolator
    This function is the a linear interpolator for floats. It will create a straight interpolation from the initial value to the current value.

    • Method Detail

      • interpolate

        public float interpolate(float initialValue,
                float currentValue,
                float alpha)
        The interpolation algorithm. This takes the initial value, the current value, and the ratio of initial value to current value. The result is then returned for use.
        Specified by:
        interpolate in interface FloatInterpolator
        Parameters:
        initialValue - the initial value
        currentValue - the current value
        alpha - a value between 0.0f to 1.0f. When alpha is 0.0f, the value should always be the initial value. When alpha is at 1.0f, the value should always be the current value.
